text: With our technology, with objects, literally three people in a garage can blow away what 200 people at Microsoft can do. Literally can blow it away. Corporate America has a need that is so huge and can save them so much money, or make them so much money, or cost them so much money if they miss it, that they are going to fuel the object revolution.
author: Steve Jobs

text: A rich man is nothing but a poor man with money.
author: W. C. Fields

text: This film cost $31 million. With that kind of money I could have invaded some country.
author: Clint Eastwood

text: You use your money to buy privacy because during most of your life you aren't allowed to be normal.
author: Johnny Depp

text: If you make any money, the government shoves you in the creek once a year with it in your pockets, and all that don't get wet you can keep.
author: Will Rogers
